about_the_game:
Engineer a fast and efficient train network on Mars. Build a thriving business and grow a dynamic economy in this Transport and Economy Management game:

  • Construct a network of high speed futuristic maglev trains on the dusty red surface of Mars
  • Perfect your train scheduling system for maximum efficiency and profit
  • Grow the Martian economy by analysing trends and identifying production bottlenecks

Mars needs trains! The old dust-road and rocket transportation network is not fit for a fast growing dynamic Martian economy. Help the colonies thrive by creating a shiny brand new network of fast and efficient maglev trains. Build your transportation business into a thriving corporate conglomerate.

Mars Rapid Transit features a sophisticated Martian economic simulation:

  • Dynamic local and global pricing driven by supply and demand
  • Industry and Colony growth and decline based on Individual (NPC) company performance
  • Product lifespans and optimal delivery times: Passengers commute at rush-hour times whilst food spoils and industrial products lose their value if you take too long to deliver

It's time for Mars to Prosper!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3230M @ 2.60GHz or equivalent AMD processor and above
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB nVidia GeForce GT460 or AMD equivalent
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9 Compatible Audio
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-7700 CPU @ 3.60GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 8GB nVidia GeForce GTX1070
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9 Compatible Audio
